Quick Oreo Ice Cream

Ingredients

1 package of Oreos
2 cups of vanilla ice cream
1 cup of whipped cream

How to Make It?

Crush the Oreos. In a bowl, mix crushed Oreos with softened vanilla ice cream and whipped cream. Pour the mixture into a container and freeze for at least 4 hours. Serve and enjoy!
